name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized Access Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an unauthorized user exploited an open port to execute malicious scripts on the organization's network.

action--5e3b1c59-8e7a-41a7-a29e-dc1ede5f.name: Kill malicious process
action--5e3b1c59-8e7a-41a7-a29e-dc1ede5f.description: Terminate the processes executing malicious scripts.

action--73b84c2e-d9be-46d5-896c-b14bb6ba.name: Scan for remaining threats
action--73b84c2e-d9be-46d5-896c-b14bb6ba.description: Run a virus scan until no threats are found.

commands.command: while ! grep -q 'No threats found' scan_results.log; do run_virus_scan; done

action--b1dc6471-bd3e-49d2-ba77-83615ae5.name: Isolate affected systems
action--b1dc6471-bd3e-49d2-ba77-83615ae5.description: Block incoming connections from malicious IPs.

parallel--0a456dec-56b5-48d5-9efc-becae1.name: Address malicious activity
parallel--0a456dec-56b5-48d5-9efc-becae1.description: Simultaneously isolate affected systems and kill malicious processes.
